#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
ll k=-1;
ll arrayy[1000000];
bool checkbouncy(ll n)
{
    ll r,m;
    ll rev;
    while(n!=0)
    {
        rev=n%10;
        arrayy[++k]=rev;
        n=n/10;



    }
    bool checkk=false;
    bool doublecheck=true;
    if(arrayy[1]>arrayy[0])
        checkk=true;
    for(ll i=0;i<k;i++)
    {
        if(checkk)
        {
            if(arrayy[i+1]<arrayy[i])
                doublecheck=false;

        }
        else
        {
            if(arrayy[i+1]>arrayy[i])
                doublecheck=false;
        }

    }
    return doublecheck;
}
int main()
{
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        k=-1;
        bool checked;
        ll n;
        cin>>n;
        checked=checkbouncy(n);
        if(!checked)
            cout<<1<<endl;
        else
            cout<<0<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
